sourcesContent:
<template>
  <l-map :zoom="zoom" :center="center">
    <l-tile-layer :url="url"></l-tile-layer>
    <l-marker v-for="(marker, index) in markers" :key="index" :lat-lng="marker.coordinates" @click="openPopup(marker)">
      <l-popup :lat-lng="marker.coordinates" :content="marker.content" :options="popupOptions"></l-popup>
    </l-marker>
  </l-map>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      zoom: 13,
      center: [51.505, -0.09], // Initial map center coordinates
      url: 'https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', // Tile layer URL
      markers: [
        { coordinates: [51.505, -0.09], content: 'Marker 1' },
        { coordinates: [51.51, -0.1], content: 'Marker 2' },
        // Add more markers as needed
      ],
      popupOptions: { maxWidth: 200 }, // Customize popup options
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openPopup(marker) {
      // Handle marker click event
      console.log('Clicked marker:', marker);
    },
  },
};
</script>
